greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct parts that are not squarefree.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k)/(1 + mu(k)^2*x^k), where mu(k) is the Moebius function (A008683). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 30 2016
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[i*(i+1)/2<n, 0, If[n==0, 1, b[n, i-1] + If[i>n || SquareFreeQ[i], 0, b[n-i, i-1]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 22 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
program: p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2015
